name: alfred-timein
description: Alfred workflow to get current time in any city using alfy, node-geocoder, and tz-lookup.

scripts.build: rm -rf node_modules && npm install --production && npm dedupe && npx modclean --run
scripts.test: [ -d node_modules/vitest ] || npm run dev; NODE_NO_WARNINGS=1 vitest

author: Xavier Spriet
